text:
> Sports Cubs hit 6 home runs, top Cardinals 8-6 for 2-1 lead in NLDS St. Louis Cardinals' Stephen Piscotty (55) collides with Kolten Wong (16) as Piscotty catches a foul ball hit by Chicago Cubs Starlin Castro (13) during the fifth inning of Game 3 in baseball's National League Division Series, Monday, Oct. 12, 2015, in Chicago. (AP Photo/Charles Rex Arbogast)
